title: Host-Pathogen Relationship Data Schema
description: Schema for extracted host-pathogen relationships from scientific literature for One Health PROTECT

Detection_Method.description: Detection method used (e.g., PCR, Serology, etc.)

Sample_type.description: Identity of the samples that were tested. Found in ticks but not in tick hosts (optional)

Relevant_Sentence.description: Text that describes the relationship between host and pathogen in PDF (should generally be in the Results section)

Opt_Vector_Name.description: Optional: Name of vector from PDF

Opt_GenBank_Accession.description: Optional: GenBank Accession numbers reported in PDF

Opt_Sentence_Reference.description: If relationship is from a table with a reference, put associated reference text here (optional)

Extraction_quality_score.description: Source data quality score (5-point Likert scale)

English.description: Flag if language is not English - could affect extraction quality and should be reviewed by a human

Supplemental_Material.description: Does it seem like more information might be present in the supplemental data?
